document_data.name: Koalinth
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Koalinth''''' was a ship captained by the [[hobgoblin]] [[Klarz]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the years following the [[War of the Silver Marches]], ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1485}}, Klarz sailed the ''Koalinth'' in search of King [[Hekaton]] and the ''[[Morkoth (ship)|Morkoth]]''. He was hired by the [[druid]]s of the [[Emerald Enclave]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Klarz kept a crew of twenty [[hobgoblin]]s and five [[bugbear]]s aboard the ''Koalinth''.
